snippet.title: Turbo Shell Demo Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Turbo Shell is a fast-paced precision platformer with a unique movement mechanic: instead of running and jumping, you push and pull yourself through levels with the help of a special device. Traverse through ever more challenging levels as Craig The Egg, collect rewards – and beat your friends’ best time!

Play the free demo and wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1565880/Turbo_Shell/

Got feedback for us? Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/d6UAh5cqzb

#turboshell #indiegame #indiedev #platformer
